text: mariyu allah miku, mi grhalalo nivasam erparicadu. Mariyu pasuvula carmalato miku indlu (gudaralu) nirmincadu. Avi miku prayananlo unnappudu mariyu miru basa cesinappudu, cala telikaga untayi. Vati unnito, boccugala carmalato mariyu ventrukalato grhopalankarana samagri mariyu kontakalam sukhanga gadupukune vastuvulanu (mi koraku srstincadu)
